urls.title: Dietary options on your intercontinental KLM flight - KLM United Kingdom
urls.description: Do you prefer a meal tailored to your medical diet, food allergies, religion, or other dietary needs? Order it upfront for your intercontinental KLM flight. - KLM United Kingdom

data.text: @Buboot If it is still relevant, an overview of the special meals we offer can be found via: https://t.co/kpOikjf1tb. You can order your meal via Arrange (dietary) meal > Your trip > Meal. These meals can be ordered up to 24 hours (Kosher meals: until 48 hours) before departure.
